column3: (Cookie No HttpOnly Flag - stateless JSON API, no cookies)
(Cookie Without Secure Flag - stateless JSON API, no cookies)
(Web Browser XSS Protection Not Enabled - JSON API, no HTML)
(Cross-Domain JavaScript Source File Inclusion - no JS served)
(Anti-clickjacking Header - API does not serve HTML frames)

(Content Security Policy Header Not Set - JSON API only)
